markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Sobek (The Raging Torrent)](/Deities.aspx?ID=60)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Take what you want, indulge in base desires, feast on luxurious food, kill demons and evil creatures

**Anathema** Cower from fights, despoil the land, kill the innocent

**Follower Alignments**
N, CG, CN, CE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Favored Weapon** [Falchion](/Weapons.aspx?ID=18)

**Domains** [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=27), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=35), [Wyrmkin](/Domains.aspx?ID=57)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=154)

- **3rd**
[Feet to Fins](/Spells.aspx?ID=113)

- **4th**
[Dinosaur Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=72)
(appears as crocodile)

</column>
name: Sobek (The Raging Torrent)
